attributes.action: To Allow the De-scenting of Skunks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We already have Skunks breeding in this country, it is in the best interest of the Skunk to have the scent gland removed and to live as a domestic pet, it is not different for neturing/spaying a cat or castrating a dog which is in the interest of the pet also.
